formatDepositCall(address,address,uint25.details: Caller must validate expected shares received if required

params._depositAsset: The token to deposit for shares
params._depositAssetAmount: The exact amount of _depositAsset to deposit

formatSingleAssetRedemptionCall(address,.details: Caller must validate expected shares received if required

params._amount: The exact amount of either shares or _asset, determined by _amountIsShares
params._amountIsShares: True if _amount is shares (to redeem), false if _asset (to receive)

returns.globalConfigLib_: The address of the GlobalConfigLib target

isValidRedeemSharesCall(address,address,.details: Use  NO_VALIDATION_ constants to skip optional validation of recipient and/or amount

params._recipientToValidate: The intended recipient of the assets received from the redemption
params._sharesAmountToValidate: The intended amount of shares to redeem

returns.uuid_: The bytes32 hash representing the UUID

setGlobalConfigLib(address).details: This function is absolutely critical. __updateCodeAddress() validates that the target is a valid Proxiable contract instance. Does not block _nextGlobalConfigLib from being the same as the current GlobalConfigLib

params._nextGlobalConfigLib: The address to set as the GlobalConfigLib

formatDepositCall(address,address,uint25.notice: Formats a deposit call, relative to a vault's current version

formatSingleAssetRedemptionCall(address,.notice: Formats a redemption call to receive a single asset, relative to a vault's current version

getGlobalConfigLib().notice: Gets the GlobalConfigLib target for the GlobalConfigProxy

init(address).notice: Initializes the GlobalConfigProxy with core configuration

isValidRedeemSharesCall(address,address,.notice: Validates whether a call to redeem shares is valid for the shares version

proxiableUUID().notice: Returns a unique bytes32 hash for GlobalConfigLib instances

setGlobalConfigLib(address).notice: Sets the GlobalConfigLib target for the GlobalConfigProxy
